markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Astrolabe of Falling Stars](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2412)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [astrolabe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2411) is fashioned of magically attuned platinum plates and rings and is inset with carefully measured ruby gems. The astrolabe's back is engraved with helpful charts, a calendar, and a maker's mark. An _astrolabe of falling stars_ can be used as a mariner's astrolabe. In addition, it can produce the following magical effect.

<document level="2" id="action-1989" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Astrolabe of Falling Stars
